activities.name: Headhunter

vehicles.strategy: Always target armored car first with homing missiles, then hover high and pick off bodyguards

details: 🎯 TARGET ORDER: Armored car → 3 bodyguards around the target
🚁 STRATEGY: Stay airborne, use homing missiles, maintain altitude to avoid RPGs
⏰ EFFICIENCY: Park Sparrow on nearby rooftop between targets
💡 TIP: If no aircraft, use Kuruma and drive-by shooting
🔄 COOLDOWN: 5 minutes between VIP work missions
💰 PAYOUT: $20K-25K depending on time taken (under 7 minutes = max payout)

activities.name: Sightseer

vehicles.strategy: Travel to closest package first, then work outward to maximize efficiency

details: 💻 OBJECTIVE: Hack 3 briefcases at random locations around map
🚁 ROUTE: Always do closest → furthest to minimize travel time
⚠️ ALTERNATIVE: If packages are spread far apart, do 'Hostile Takeover - LSIA' instead
💡 NO COMBAT: Pure travel mission, no enemies to fight
⏰ TIME BONUS: Complete under 5 minutes for maximum payout
🔄 ROTATION: Alternate with Headhunter during cooldowns

activities.name: Hostile Takeover

vehicles.strategy: LSIA (easiest) or Altruist Camp, eliminate enemies and collect briefcase

details: 🏢 BEST LOCATIONS: LSIA (airport - easiest), Altruist Camp (mountain)
⚔️ LSIA STRATEGY: Drive to hangar, kill 6-8 enemies, grab briefcase
🏔️ ALTRUIST STRATEGY: More enemies but closer together, use cover
💡 TIP: Use when Sightseer packages are too spread out
🚗 VEHICLE: Any armored car works, Kuruma ideal for protection

activities.name: Asset Recovery

vehicles.strategy: Steal specific vehicle and deliver to warehouse, avoid damage

details: 🚗 OBJECTIVE: Steal specific vehicle (changes each time)
🎯 LOCATIONS: Various around Los Santos, check GPS
⚠️ ENEMIES: Usually 4-6 NPCs guarding the target vehicle
💡 CARGOBOB METHOD: Pick up vehicle to avoid damage (if you own one)
🔧 CONDITION: Vehicle condition affects payout - avoid damage

activities.name: Sell Nightclub Stock

vehicles.strategy: OPTIMAL: Sell at 120-150 units for guaranteed Mule Custom (best handling)

details: 🎯 SWEET SPOT: 90-180 units = Mule Custom (easiest to drive)
🌆 BUYERS: Always choose Los Santos buyers (shorter distance)
👥 SESSION: Solo public session mandatory (avoid griefers)
💰 PROFIT: $600K-900K for optimal range, $1.2M for full warehouse
⏰ PRODUCTION: Takes 20+ hours to reach 180 units
🔧 TECHNICIANS: Assign to Cargo, Sporting Goods, Pharmaceutical, Cash, Cocaine
💡 TIP: Never exceed 180 units if you want to avoid Pounder Custom

activities.name: Asset Protection

vehicles.strategy: Protect client's assets from attackers, easiest security contract

details: 🛡️ OBJECTIVE: Defend CEO's car, yacht, or other assets
🚁 STRATEGY: Use Sparrow missiles to eliminate attackers quickly
⏰ EFFICIENCY: Shortest and easiest security contract
💡 SPAWN: Agency Sparrow spawns right outside building
🔄 COOLDOWN: No cooldown between security contracts

activities.name: Gang Termination

vehicles.strategy: Eliminate gang members at specific location, use cover and armor

details: 🎯 OBJECTIVE: Eliminate all gang members at marked location
🚗 STRATEGY: Use Kuruma for protection, park safely and clear on foot
⚔️ COMBAT: 10-15 enemies, use cover and snacks/armor
💡 TIP: Clear from outside-in to avoid being surrounded

activities.name: Deliver Customer Vehicles

launchLocation.name: Auto Shop
launchLocation.method: Customer vehicles appear automatically, check garage

vehicles.strategy: Modify to exact customer specifications, deliver without damage for full payment

details: 🔧 MODIFICATIONS: Follow customer request exactly (color, wheels, etc.)
🚗 DELIVERY: Drive carefully to avoid damage penalties
💰 PAYOUT: $20K-30K for clean delivery, reduced for damage
👥 STAFF: Can have staff deliver for 50% profit while you do other activities
⏰ FREQUENCY: New customer car every 48 minutes (real time)
💡 TIP: Check phone for customer specifications before modifying

activities.name: Exotic Exports List

launchLocation.name: LS Car Meet
launchLocation.method: Notice board for daily list, then search map

vehicles.strategy: Check LS Car Meet board daily, locate and deliver 10 specific vehicles

details: 📋 LIST: Check LS Car Meet notice board for today's 10 vehicles
🚗 VEHICLES: Spawn randomly around map, use interaction menu to request locations
💰 PAYOUT: $20,000 per vehicle + $100,000 bonus for all 10
📱 TRACKING: Use phone app to see general locations
⏰ DAILY RESET: New list every 24 hours (real time)
💡 TIP: Some vehicles only spawn during specific weather/time conditions

activities.name: Robbery in Progress

vehicles.strategy: Eliminate robbers and recover stolen goods, use armored vehicle

details: 🎯 OBJECTIVE: Stop robbery and eliminate all perpetrators
🚗 APPROACH: Use armored vehicle or aircraft with missiles
💰 GOODS: Collect briefcase after eliminating enemies
⏰ EFFICIENCY: Can be done quickly with proper vehicle
🔄 ROTATION: Good to mix with other client jobs

activities.name: Scope Out Mission

vehicles.strategy: Use Sparrow to quickly travel around island, land near points of interest

details: 🎯 PRIMARY TARGET: Always check office safe (Panther Statue = $1.9M, Pink Diamond = $1.4M, Bearer Bonds = $1.1M, Tequila = $900K)
🚪 ENTRY POINTS: Drainage tunnel is BEST (no detection, direct basement access)
💰 SECONDARY LOOT: Prioritize cocaine ($220K-440K), then weed ($150K-378K), cash is worst
✂️ BOLT CUTTERS: Essential for wire fences, found in 11 possible locations
👕 DISGUISES: Guard clothes (compound) and supply truck driver outfit
🔑 KEYCARDS: Blue keycard (beach party area), red keycard (office after primary target)
⚠️ CAMERAS: Mark all security cameras during scope to avoid during heist
🚁 ESCAPE: Mark motorcycle spawn points near compound for quick exit

activities.name: Prep Missions (Required)

vehicles.strategy: Always use Sparrow from Kosatka, park on rooftops when possible

setupMissions.name: Approach Vehicle
setupMissions.tip: Kosatka drainage tunnel = direct basement access, no guards

setupMissions.name: Equipment
setupMissions.tip: Safecracker is faster than plasma cutter for office safe

setupMissions.name: Disruption (Optional)
setupMissions.tip: Skip disruption missions for faster setup, not needed for stealth approach

details: 🎯 MANDATORY: Always do Approach Vehicle + Equipment missions
⏱️ TIME SAVER: Skip disruption missions unless going loud
🔫 WEAPON LOADOUT: Conspirator (silenced weapons) best for stealth
🎒 EQUIPMENT TIP: Safecracker kit opens office safe 50% faster than plasma cutter
📍 MISSION LOCATIONS: Use interaction menu > Kosatka > Request Sparrow for instant spawn

activities.name: The Heist (Solo Stealth Route)

vehicles.strategy: Stealth only, avoid all unnecessary guards, prioritize speed over perfection

details: 🏊 ENTRY: Drainage tunnel → swim to grate → enter basement (NO GUARDS ALERTED)
💰 LOOT ORDER: Secondary loot FIRST (basement/compound), primary target LAST
🚪 BASEMENT ROUTE: Storage room → office stairs → avoid camera in hallway
🎯 OFFICE: Hack fingerprint scanner, grab primary target, exit through office door
🏃 ESCAPE: Main gate (NOT compound exit), steal motorcycle, drive to main dock cliff
🌊 CLIFF JUMP: Drive off east cliff into water for instant escape (no boat needed)
⚠️ STEALTH TIPS: Stay behind guards, use cover, one headshot kills with conspirator weapons
💡 SPEED TIPS: Don't grab loot outside compound unless cocaine, 8-minute runs possible

activities.name: Advanced Strategies & Tips
details: 🔄 REPLAY STRATEGY: Primary target changes every scope out, secondary loot spawns are random
💎 LOOT PRIORITY: Panther Statue ($1.9M) > Pink Diamond ($1.4M) > Bearer Bonds ($1.1M) > Tequila ($900K)
🗝️ KEYCARD STRATEGY: Blue keycard opens extra loot areas, red keycard from office unlocks escape route
👥 MULTI-PLAYER: Gold requires 2+ players (can't carry alone), art/cash/weed can be solo
⏰ COOLDOWN: 3 real-world hours between heists (solo), 1 hour (team)
🎒 LOOT CAPACITY: Can carry 1 full stack of secondary loot solo, cocaine fills bag fastest
📱 HEIST REPLAY: Complete scope out every time, prep missions stay completed if failed
🏆 ELITE CHALLENGE: Complete in under 15 minutes, stealth, no restart = extra $50K-100K

activities.name: Scope Out Casino

vehicles.strategy: Park away from casino, walk around to avoid suspicion

details: 📸 MANDATORY PHOTOS: All 10 access points (roof, sewer, tunnel, etc.)
🎰 VAULT CONTENTS: Check what's in the vault (diamonds > gold > art > cash)
📋 OPTIONAL INTEL: Security cameras (14 total), keycard doors, guard patrol routes
🚪 ACCESS POINTS: Staff lobby (easiest), waste disposal (sneaky), roof (aggressive)
💡 TIP: Take photos of everything for maximum intel bonus
⏰ COOLDOWN: Can only scope once per heist setup

activities.name: Casino Prep Missions

vehicles.strategy: Always use armored vehicles for prep missions involving combat

setupMissions.tip: EMP device disables all electronics for 30 seconds during heist
Gruppe Sechs disguise is easiest, lets you walk right in
Destroy all 10 Duggan shipments to weaken casino security armor

details: 🎯 MANDATORY PREPS: Each approach has 4-6 required setup missions
🔫 DUGGAN SHIPMENTS: Only required for Aggressive (10 locations, use Oppressor MK2)
👔 DISGUISES: Gruppe Sechs (maintenance), Firefighters, Police, etc.
🚗 GETAWAY VEHICLES: Choose between armored cars or motorcycles
💡 EFFICIENCY: Skip optional preps unless going for elite challenge

approaches.name: Silent & Sneaky
approaches.strategy: Avoid cameras, use silenced weapons, coordinate takedowns
tips: Entry: Staff lobby or waste disposal
Vault: Hack keypads quietly, avoid detection
Exit: NOOSE outfit through staff lobby

approaches.name: The Big Con
approaches.description: Disguise approach, walk in the front door
approaches.strategy: Use disguises to blend in, minimal combat until detected
tips: Entry: Main entrance with Gruppe Sechs gear
Vault: Disguise holds until you leave vault area
Best for: First-time casino heist players

approaches.name: Aggressive
approaches.strategy: Fight through casino security, use cover and teamwork
tips: Entry: Blast through front or back entrances
Vault: Combat throughout, bring heavy weapons
Exit: Fighting all the way to getaway vehicles
Best for: Players who prefer action over stealth

targets.name: Diamonds
targets.note: Only during special events, easiest to grab

targets.name: Gold
targets.note: Requires 2+ players, can't solo all carts

targets.name: Artwork
targets.note: Can be grabbed solo, moderate difficulty

targets.name: Cash
targets.note: Worst target, takes longest to grab

activities.name: Advanced Casino Strategies
details: 🔄 APPROACH ROTATION: Can't repeat same approach twice, rotates Silent→Big Con→Aggressive
👥 CREW SELECTION: Lower skilled crew = more money, higher skilled = easier heist
💰 PAYOUT BREAKDOWN: 60-85% host cut depending on crew size and split
🎯 ELITE CHALLENGE: Complete in 15 minutes, stealth (Silent/Big Con), $100K bonus
🏆 HARD MODE: Available if completed previous heist in same session, +10% payout
📱 HEIST REPLAY: Must do scope out every time, preps reset after completion
💡 MONEY TIPS: Host should take 85% on 2-player, 70-75% on 3-4 players
⏰ COOLDOWN: No cooldown between casino heists (unlike Cayo Perico)

activities.name: Fleeca Job

vehicles.strategy: Simple drilling finale, good for beginners

details: 🏦 SETUP: Scope the bank, steal Kuruma, get hacking device
💳 FINALE: One player drills, other holds hostages
🚗 ESCAPE: Drive Kuruma to Lester's factory
💡 TIP: Easiest heist, perfect for new players
⏰ ELITE: Complete in under 5 minutes and 40 seconds

activities.name: Prison Break

vehicles.strategy: Coordinate air support with ground team

details: ✈️ SETUP: Steal Velum, get bus, prison intel, wet work
🚁 FINALE: Pilot + Demolition (air), Officer + Prisoner (ground)
🎯 STRATEGY: Demo destroys jets, Pilot picks up team at beach
💡 TIP: Most difficult classic heist due to coordination needed
⚠️ COMMON FAIL: Pilot getting shot down by jets

activities.name: Humane Labs Raid

vehicles.strategy: Use heavy vehicles for combat missions

details: 🧪 SETUP: Key codes, Insurgents, EMP device, Valkyrie, Hydra
🎖️ FINALE: Two teams - ground assault and air support
💡 STRATEGY: Air team clears enemies, ground team plants EMP
⚠️ DIFFICULTY: Requires good pilots and coordination
🏆 ELITE: Complete without losing any lives

activities.name: Series A Funding

vehicles.strategy: Heavy combat focus, use armored vehicles

details: 💊 SETUP: Coke, meth, weed, steal Lectro, trash truck
🔫 FINALE: Defend Trevor's meth lab from waves of enemies
💡 STRATEGY: Use cover, focus fire on priority targets
⚠️ CHALLENGE: Very combat-heavy, requires good shooting skills
🎯 TIP: Host should have snacks and armor ready

activities.name: Pacific Standard

vehicles.strategy: Kuruma method for finale to minimize damage

details: 🏦 SETUP: Vans, signal, hacking device, convoy, bikes
💰 FINALE: Rob Pacific Standard Bank, escape on bikes through sewers
🚗 KURUMA METHOD: One player gets Kuruma, team gets in for safe escape
💡 STRATEGY: Demolition carries bag, others provide cover
🏆 ELITE: Complete in under 10:15 with no damage to Kuruma
💸 MAX TAKE: $1.25M with elite challenge and careful play

activities.name: Act I: The Data Breaches

vehicles.strategy: Use Kuruma for most combat setups

details: 🎯 SETUPS: Dead Courier, Signal Intercepts, Server Farm, Rescue ULP, Submarine Recon
🎖️ FINALE: Infiltrate IAA facility and rescue Agent ULP
💡 STRATEGY: Stealth approach recommended, use hacking skills
🏆 ELITE: Complete all setups and finale on hard difficulty
⚠️ DIFFICULTY: Moderate, good for intermediate players

activities.name: Act II: The Bogdan Problem

vehicles.strategy: Naval and air combat focus

details: 🚁 SETUPS: Rescue ULP, Salvage Hard Drives, Submarine Reconnaissance, Avenger, RCV
🌊 FINALE: Underwater infiltration of Russian submarine
💡 STRATEGY: One team takes sub route, other takes Avenger route
⚠️ REPLAY GLITCH: Popular for money glitching (against ToS)
🏆 ELITE: Complete finale in under 15 minutes on hard mode

activities.name: Act III: The Doomsday Scenario

vehicles.strategy: Hardest heist in game, requires coordination

details: 🎯 SETUPS: Rescue Agent 14, Khanjali, Barrage, Chernobog, Volatol
🚀 FINALE: Mt. Chiliad facility assault with jetpacks
💡 STRATEGY: Perfect coordination required, use cover extensively
⚠️ DIFFICULTY: Hardest heist finale in the game
🎖️ JETPACK SECTION: Most challenging part, requires skill and patience
🏆 ELITE: Nearly impossible, only for expert teams

activities.name: Union Depository Contract

vehicles.strategy: Most profitable Auto Shop contract, requires skilled driving for finale

details: 🏦 SETUPS: Reconnaissance (scope security), Equipment prep (hacking device), Vehicle prep
💰 FINALE: Infiltrate Union Depository vault, steal gold bars from safety deposit boxes
🚗 ESCAPE: High-speed chase through downtown Los Santos traffic
💡 BEST CONTRACT: Highest payout of all Auto Shop contracts
⚠️ DIFFICULTY: Finale car chase is very challenging, requires excellent driving
🎯 VEHICLE TIP: Use Krieger, Emerus, or other high-end sports car with good handling
🔄 COOLDOWN: Can replay after cooldown, no setup cost

activities.name: Fleeca Bank Contract

vehicles.strategy: Classic bank robbery, easiest Auto Shop contract

details: 🏦 SETUP: Scope the Fleeca bank, acquire drilling equipment
💳 FINALE: Standard Fleeca bank robbery with vault drilling mini-game
🏍️ ESCAPE: Motorcycle chase through city streets
💡 EASIEST: Most straightforward Auto Shop contract, good for beginners
⏰ SPEED: Can be completed very quickly once familiar with route
🎯 DRILLING TIP: Keep drill temperature in green zone for fastest progress

activities.name: Prison Contract

vehicles.strategy: Extract target from Bolingbroke Penitentiary using helicopter

details: 🚁 SETUP: Plan extraction route, acquire equipment and disguises
🏢 INFILTRATION: Enter prison facility and locate target
🚁 EXTRACTION: Buzzard helicopter pickup from prison yard
💡 STEALTH: Use stealth approach to minimize wanted level
⚠️ TIMING: Have escape route and helicopter ready before starting extraction
🎯 TIP: Land helicopter in prison yard, not on roof

activities.name: Agency Bank Contract

vehicles.strategy: Multi-stage bank heist with heavy security

details: 🏦 SETUPS: Infiltrate IAA building, acquire keycards and intel
💰 FINALE: Rob high-security bank vault with multiple stages
🚁 ESCAPE: Coordinated escape with multiple vehicles
⚠️ DIFFICULTY: More complex than other Auto Shop contracts
🔫 COMBAT: Heavy security, bring armor and snacks

activities.name: 32-Car Method (Optimal)

vehicles.strategy: Maintain exactly 32 cars: 10 Standard + 10 Mid + 12 Top-Range, only sell Top-Range

details: 🎯 COLLECTION PHASE: Source cars until you have 10 Standard + 10 Mid-Range
🚫 NEVER SELL: Standard and Mid-Range cars (keep all 20)
💰 PROFIT PHASE: Only source and sell Top-Range cars ($80K profit each)
🎯 SPECIALIST DEALER: Always choose this option for maximum profit ($100K sale)
🚁 CARGOBOB METHOD: Use Cargobob to lift cars and avoid NPC damage
⏰ EFFICIENCY: Source car → Headhunter → Sell car → repeat
💡 DAMAGE COSTS: Repair costs reduce profit, drive carefully or use Cargobob

activities.name: Bunker Production & Sales

launchLocation.name: Bunker
launchLocation.method: Computer terminal for supplies and sales

setup: Varies: Phantom Wedge, Insurgent, Dune FAV, Marshall, Merryweather
vehicles.strategy: ALWAYS buy supplies, sell at 25% stock for guaranteed single vehicle

details: 💰 SUPPLY STRATEGY: Always BUY supplies for $75,000 (never steal - wastes time)
📊 SELL TIMING: Sell at 25% stock ($175K value) = guaranteed 1 vehicle delivery
🚚 VEHICLE GUARANTEE: 25% stock = 1 vehicle, 50% = 1-2 vehicles, 75%+ = 2-3 vehicles
💡 PROFIT CALCULATION: $175K sale - $75K supplies = $100K profit (passive income)
⏰ TIMING: Takes 2h 20min to convert 1 supply bar to 25% stock
🔧 UPGRADES: Staff + Equipment upgrades are ESSENTIAL for profitability
🌆 BUYERS: Always sell to Los Santos for maximum profit
👥 SESSION: Use solo public session to avoid griefers

activities.name: Cargo Warehouse (CEO Crates)

vehicles.strategy: Always buy 3 crates, wait for double money events, use solo public sessions

details: 💰 CRATE STRATEGY: Always buy 3 crates ($18K) - most efficient cost per crate
🏪 WAREHOUSE SIZES: Small (16), Medium (42), Large (111 crates)
📈 PROFIT SCALING: Large warehouse = $2.22M normal, $4.44M during 2x events
🚚 TERRORBYTE: Source crates from anywhere without returning to office
⚠️ RAID PROTECTION: Sell before reaching 78 crates or face potential raids
⏰ 2X EVENTS: Wait for double money weeks for maximum profit
👥 SOLO DELIVERY: Large warehouse sale usually requires multiple people
🎯 EFFICIENCY: Source 3 crates → VIP work → repeat

activities.name: Cocaine Lockup

vehicles.strategy: Buy supplies, sell at 2.5 bars for guaranteed single vehicle

details: 💰 PROFIT: $420K sale - $225K supplies = $195K profit per cycle
📊 OPTIMAL SALE: 2.5 bars = 1 vehicle, 5 bars = 2-4 vehicles
🔧 UPGRADES: Staff + Equipment upgrades essential for profitability
⏰ PRODUCTION: 5 hours for full stock with upgrades
🚚 VEHICLE TYPES: Post Op (worst), Garbage Truck (bad), Boat/Heli (good)
💡 SUPPLY TIP: Buy supplies for $75K each (stealing wastes time)

activities.name: Methamphetamine Lab

vehicles.strategy: Second most profitable MC business after Cocaine

details: 💰 PROFIT: $357K sale - $225K supplies = $132K profit per cycle
📈 RANKING: 2nd most profitable MC business
🔧 SETUP: Same upgrade and supply strategy as Cocaine
⏰ TIMING: Slightly lower production rate than Cocaine

activities.name: Acid Production & Sales

vehicles.strategy: Mobile lab that produces while you play, excellent passive income

details: 🚐 MOBILE: Lab moves around map automatically, no fixed location
💰 PASSIVE: Produces acid while you do other activities
🎯 SALES: Deliver in Brickade, usually single vehicle
🔧 UPGRADES: Equipment upgrade increases production speed
💡 BONUS: Complete Freakshop missions for better production
⏰ EFFICIENCY: One of the best passive income sources in game

activities.name: Daily Objectives
details: Complete 3 daily objectives
7 day streak: $100,000 bonus
28 day streak: $500,000 bonus
Check interaction menu

activities.name: Lucky Wheel Spin
details: One spin per real day
Can win podium vehicle
Mystery prizes available

activities.name: Weekly Time Trial

vehicles.strategy: Learn the route, use fastest vehicle for class

details: 🗓️ SCHEDULE: Changes every Thursday at 10 AM GMT
🏁 PAR TIME: Varies by location and vehicle class
💰 TRIPLE REWARDS: $101,000 during 3x events
🏍️ VEHICLE TIP: Check required vehicle class (bike, car, etc.)
📍 ROUTE: Practice the route before attempting for best time

activities.name: RC Bandito Time Trial

launchLocation.name: Map
launchLocation.method: Blue RC time trial icon (changes weekly)

vehicles.strategy: Much easier than regular time trials, very forgiving

details: 🎮 RC VEHICLE: Use RC Bandito (can be claimed free from Arena War)
😊 DIFFICULTY: Much easier than regular time trials
🗓️ WEEKLY: New location every Thursday
💰 CONSISTENT: $100,000 every completion
💡 TIP: More forgiving than regular time trials, great for beginners

activities.name: Stunt Races

vehicles.strategy: Focus on 2x money weeks for maximum profit

details: 🏁 VARIETY: Different race types (Super, Sports, Motorcycles, etc.)
💰 2X EVENTS: Wait for double money weeks for best payout
🏆 WINNING: First place gets maximum payout
👥 LOBBIES: Join during bonus weeks for better payouts
🎯 STRATEGY: Learn popular tracks for consistent wins

activities.name: Rooftop Rumble (Martin)

vehicles.strategy: Wait 4+ minutes before delivery for maximum payout

details: 🎯 STRATEGY: Kill all enemies at FIB building, steal package
⏰ TIMING: Wait 4+ minutes before delivery for max payout ($25K)
🚗 KURUMA METHOD: Drive Kuruma up parking garage for easy kills
💰 2X EVENTS: $50,000 during double money weeks
📞 ACCESS: Call Martin Madrazo after reaching Level 75

activities.name: Blow Up (Simeon)

vehicles.strategy: Destroy cars with sticky bombs or RPG

details: 💣 OBJECTIVE: Destroy specific vehicles around the city
🚗 LOCATIONS: Check GPS for vehicle locations
💥 EXPLOSIVES: Use sticky bombs or RPG for quick destruction
📞 ACCESS: Call Simeon Yetarian

activities.name: Los Santos Connection (Martin)

vehicles.strategy: Clear enemies, steal drugs, deliver to location

details: 🎯 OBJECTIVE: Steal drugs from gang members, deliver to Martin
⚔️ COMBAT: Multiple enemy waves, use cover and armor
🚁 EFFICIENCY: Use Buzzard for travel between locations
💰 PAYOUT: Higher payout than most contact missions

activities.name: Sumo (Remix)

vehicles.strategy: Push opponents off platform, avoid being pushed

details: 🥊 OBJECTIVE: Push other players off the platform using vehicles
🏆 STRATEGY: Use momentum and timing to knock opponents off
💰 2X EVENTS: Best during double money weeks
🎮 ROUNDS: Multiple rounds, winner takes highest payout
💡 TIP: Stay in center, use other players' momentum against them

activities.name: Motor Wars

launchLocation.name: Phone
launchLocation.method: Quick Job > Adversary Modes > Motor Wars

vehicles.strategy: Battle royale with vehicles, last team standing wins

details: ⚔️ BATTLE ROYALE: Last team/player standing wins
🚗 VEHICLES: Various weaponized vehicles provided
💰 SURVIVAL: Longer survival = higher payout
🎯 STRATEGY: Stay mobile, use terrain for cover
👥 TEAMS: Can be solo or team-based depending on lobby

activities.name: Armored Truck Robbery

launchLocation.name: Open World
launchLocation.method: Find armored trucks randomly spawning on highways

vehicles.strategy: Use sticky bombs on back doors, collect cash

details: 🚛 RANDOM SPAWN: Armored trucks appear randomly on map
💣 METHOD: Stick bomb on back doors, stand clear, collect cash
⭐ WANTED LEVEL: Triggers 2-star wanted level
💰 VARIABLE: $10K-20K depending on truck type
📍 LOCATIONS: Usually on highways and main roads

activities.name: Security Van Robbery (Gruppe Sechs)

launchLocation.name: Open World
launchLocation.method: Follow white Gruppe Sechs vans around city

vehicles.strategy: Follow security van, wait for guards to exit, steal briefcase

details: 🚐 GRUPPE SECHS: Follow white security vans around the city
👮 GUARDS: Wait for guards to exit van at stops
💼 BRIEFCASE: Steal briefcase when guards are away
⭐ WANTED LEVEL: Minimal wanted level if done stealthily
📍 ROUTES: Vans follow predictable routes around LS

activities.name: Store Robberies

launchLocation.name: Convenience Stores
launchLocation.method: Any 24/7, LTD Gasoline, or Rob's Liquor store

vehicles.strategy: Point gun at cashier, wait for cash, escape quickly

details: 🏪 LOCATIONS: 20 convenience stores around Los Santos
🔫 METHOD: Point gun at cashier, wait for them to fill bag
⭐ WANTED LEVEL: 1-star, easy to escape
💰 SMALL MONEY: $1K-2K per store, adds up over time
⏰ COOLDOWN: Each store has individual cooldown timer

activities.name: Bounty Hunting

launchLocation.name: Map
launchLocation.method: Find red skull icons (players with bounties)

vehicles.strategy: Hunt players with bounties, avoid their retaliation

details: 🎯 TARGET: Players with bounties (red dot on map)
💰 PAYOUT: Varies based on bounty amount ($1K-10K)
⚔️ RISK: Target player will likely fight back
🚁 STRATEGY: Use aircraft for hit-and-run tactics
📍 LOCATION: Bounties show on map with red skull icon

activities.name: Most Wanted

vehicles.strategy: Survive highest wanted level using tunnels and subways

details: ⭐ OBJECTIVE: Survive 10 minutes with maximum wanted level
🚇 STRATEGY: Use subway tunnels and underground areas
🚗 ESCAPE: Fast car to reach tunnel entrances quickly
💰 PAYOUT: $30,000 for surviving full 10 minutes
📍 BEST SPOTS: Metro tunnels, underground parking garages

activities.name: Executive Deathmatch

vehicles.strategy: Kill other CEOs and VIPs while avoiding their bodyguards

details: 🎯 OBJECTIVE: Kill other CEOs/VIPs in the session
👥 TARGETS: Only other CEOs and VIPs count as targets
🚁 STRATEGY: Use aircraft for mobility and firepower
💰 SCORING: Points for kills, bonus for survival
⚠️ DIFFICULTY: Other players will target you as well

activities.name: Nightclub Safe
details: Collect every 48 minutes
Maintain popularity for max income
Check every few hours

activities.name: Agency Safe
details: Passive accumulation
Complete 201 contracts for bonus
Max capacity: $250,000
